With your permission, Ori can draft and submit materials on your behalf.

faqs.q: How does Ori protect my privacy?
faqs.a: Your data is encrypted, never sold, and only used to power your experience.

faqs.q: Can I use Ori while employed?
faqs.a: Absolutely. Ori helps you grow within your current role or explore new paths discreetly.

faqs.q: What makes Ori different from job boards?
faqs.a: Ori is a lifelong companion, not a search engine. It learns with you and adapts to your evolving goals.

bottomCta.headline: Ready to align your career?
bottomCta.description: Join thousands discovering work that fits.

header.title: An Intelligent Co-pilot for Your Career
header.subheadline: Discover how Ori's personalized features work together to build a more fulfilling professional life.

features.name: Intelligent Job Discovery
features.description: Ori goes beyond keyword matching to understand your unique combination of skills, values, and career trajectory. Using semantic analysis and pattern recognition, it identifies roles that truly fit—not just those that match a job title.
points: Semantic matching beyond titles and keywords

features.name: Adaptive Upskilling
features.description: As you explore roles and apply, Ori identifies skill gaps and suggests targeted learning resources. These recommendations evolve with market trends and your progress, creating a personalized learning path that compounds over time.
points: Tracks your progress and adjusts guidance

features.name: AI-Powered Application Builder
features.description: Draft tailored resumes, cover letters, and profiles in seconds. Ori learns your voice and adapts materials to each role while maintaining authenticity. Every application reflects your actual experience and aspirations.

features.name: Reflective Growth Tracking
features.description: Ori surfaces patterns in your applications, interviews, and outcomes. See what's working, celebrate wins, and adjust your approach with clarity. Over time, this feedback loop compounds into genuine career momentum.
points: Visual insights into your career journey

features.name: Private & Empathetic Companion
features.description: Ori is designed to be calm, non-judgmental, and genuinely helpful. Your data is private, and all interactions are on your terms. No pressure, no manipulation—just guidance that respects your agency and pace.
points: Private by design—you control your data

features.name: Continuous Market Intelligence
features.description: Ori monitors shifts in demand, emerging skills, and industry trends so you don't have to. It surfaces relevant changes and opportunities, helping you stay ahead without constant manual research.

features.name: Autonomy that Grows with You
features.description: Ori can automate applications and outreach—but only with your explicit permission. As trust builds, you can delegate more while maintaining full visibility and control. Autonomy is earned, not assumed.
points: Granular control over what Ori does

privacy.title: Private by design
bullets: You control your data—export or delete anytime

bottomCta.title: Take the Next Step in Your Career Journey
bottomCta.description: Start with our free plan and upgrade as you grow.

header.title: Choose Your Path to a Fulfilling Career
header.subheadline: Simple, transparent pricing. Start for free and upgrade anytime.

plans.name: Free
plans.description: For exploring Ori and trying your first guided matches.
plans.limitsSummary: 1 batch of personalized job openings per month.

plans.name: Plus
plans.description: For active job seekers and career growers.
plans.limitsSummary: Up to 6 batches of personalized job openings per month.

plans.name: Premium
plans.description: For power users who want continuous, high-volume guidance.
plans.limitsSummary: Up to 30 batches and up to 180 AI-curated job openings per month.

faqs.q: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

faqs.q: What is your refund or cancellation policy?
faqs.a: You can cancel anytime—no questions asked. If you're on a paid plan and cancel within the first 7 days, we'll issue a full refund. After that, you'll have access until the end of your billing period.
No. What you see is what you pay. There are no setup fees, cancellation fees, or hidden charges.

faqs.q: How does the free plan work?
faqs.a: The Free plan gives you full access to Ori's core features with a limit of 1 personalized job-opening batch per month. It's designed to let you explore the platform and experience the value before committing.

faqs.q: Can I switch between monthly and annual billing?
faqs.a: Yes. You can switch at any time from your account settings. If you switch to annual, you'll save 20% and be billed immediately for the full year.

faqs.q: What counts as a "batch" of job openings?
faqs.a: A batch is a set of personalized job openings curated by Ori based on your profile, preferences, and current goals. Each batch can contain multiple roles tailored to your fit.

aboutPage.title: About Ori | Our Mission
aboutPage.description: Learn about Ori's mission to make fulfilling work accessible to everyone. Discover the story, vision, and values behind our AI-powered career companion.

header.title: The Future of Work is Human.
header.subheadline: We believe fulfillment should not be a privilege. We are building the technology to make it scalable for everyone.

problem.title: Why We Started Ori
paragraphs: The labor market is broken. Finding work that truly fits—work that aligns with your passions, strengths, and ambitions—feels like winning the lottery. Most people settle for roles that pay the bills but drain their spirit, not because they lack potential, but because the system is random and inefficient.

Millions of talented people are stuck in jobs that do not fulfill them, while employers struggle to find the right candidates. Human potential is wasted at a staggering scale. We saw this disconnect and knew it did not have to be this way.

Ori was born from a simple belief: everyone deserves access to work that brings meaning, growth, and joy. Technology should empower individuals, not just optimize processes. So we set out to build an AI that truly understands people—not just resumes.

vision.title: A Lifelong Companion for Your Journey
paragraphs: Ori is more than a job-matching tool. It is an empathetic mentor that listens, learns, and cares. It understands your passions, your doubts, your ambitions. It does not just match you to openings—it helps you discover paths you might not have imagined.

Ori works like this: you tell us what matters to you, and we pay attention. As you engage with opportunities, learn new skills, and grow, Ori learns too. It gently adjusts your path with you, predicting what will bring you fulfillment and helping you get there.

This is not static automation. Ori evolves with you, offering adaptive upskilling suggestions, crafting personalized application materials, and continuously refining its understanding of what makes you thrive. The result? A career journey shaped by your true self, not by chance.

items.name: Empathy First
items.description: We design with compassion. Ori respects your autonomy, acknowledges your struggles, and celebrates your growth. Every decision we make starts with the question: does this serve the user's well-being?

items.name: Radical Transparency
items.description: No black boxes. We are clear about how Ori learns, what data we use, and how decisions are made. You are in control of your information and your journey.

items.name: Lifelong Learning
items.description: Careers are not linear. Ori embraces the reality that people change, pivot, and evolve. We are built to support continuous growth, not just one-time placement.

items.name: Principled Autonomy
items.description: Ori guides, but you decide. We provide insights and suggestions, but the final choice is always yours. We believe technology should empower, not dictate.

cta.title: Join Us in Reshaping the Future of Work
cta.body: Ori is here to help you find work that fits your life, not the other way around. Start your journey today.

blogPage.title: Ori Insights | Articles on AI & the Future of Work
blogPage.description: Explore articles on career development, artificial intelligence, empathetic technology, and the future of work from the Ori team.
